info.name: 13. Jenkins Integration
info.description:
**Jenkins**:  
This will be used for **continuous integration and continuous delivery.**

- **Create a personal Jenkins account for exploration**
- **Precondition**: Java should installed
    

**How to Download and****install the Jenkins**

Step 1 : Download Jenkins war file - [https://jenkins.io/](https://www.youtube.com/redirect?q=https://jenkins.io/&v=89yWXXIOisk&redir_token=QUFFLUhqbUtELUo3MVpOMUp5eEpwdGxpdVVOcGZ2WTJIZ3xBQ3Jtc0tuZG9xR01kTllQbndWUFJSSkZLVUNsTHpjVE1zN3ZLZ3F2QWYzVVRjODlVcGhmWVN2eUJYSW1YYk85bVdaU1d6dGNlYXVaTTFMRDhUaU4wVHN4bnFVN2RuSXBNbWJUNW9jVkNyc1VEOWVPS1h1NFdlYw==&event=video_description)

Step 2 : Place the war file into any location on your system

Step 3 : goto command prompt (windows) | terminal (mac)

- goto folder where jenkins.war and open cmd  
    window enter as **java -jar jenkins.war**
    

Once jenkins server is Up and running , then go to the jenkins site.

Step 4 : goto browser - [http://localhost:8080](https://www.youtube.com/redirect?q=http://localhost:8080&v=89yWXXIOisk&redir_token=QUFFLUhqbmlGeVdGQW1IYUNYUnE5d2IyWnctdkVJcGI1Z3xBQ3Jtc0tuR2xoT3RHemhEN3FlYnFib2Nhd0VkRFR3LU1FVW1WaVRGdjJVY1ExSzUtTy0zRWV6VGNnSVpKcU1vZWVSTDJfaTl2MnJLWUE4a3hmRnY5aTgxalZvMVIyUUxpUGpsNzVNcWdsOHp2eDlpRkt6NUVFQQ==&event=video_description) (Jenkins window should show up) (we  
can replace the ip address instead of localhost text)

Step 5 : install required plugins  
Step 6 : get started with Jenkins

---

**How to configure the Project in jenkins :**

1. Login to Jenkins site >
2. Create a new project (give any meaningfull name) >
3. Choose ‘Freestyle Project’ >
4. Under the ‘Build’ option >
5. Select the ‘Execute windows Batch Command’ option >
6. then enter the command as “ newman run CollectionName.Json or CollectionLink “
    

**Result will be in console output**

**************
